title: Own funds definition
text: Own funds comprise Common Equity Tier 1 (CET1), Additional Tier 1 (AT1), and Tier 2 (T2) capital. Total own funds equal the sum of eligible CET1, AT1, and T2 after applicable deductions.

title: CET1 eligibility
text: CET1 capital includes ordinary shares and retained earnings net of regulatory deductions. Institutions must report CET1 in the applicable COREP own funds template line for CET1 capital.

title: AT1 eligibility
text: AT1 capital includes eligible AT1 instruments and related premium, net of deductions. Report AT1 in the COREP own funds template line for AT1 capital.

title: Tier 2 eligibility
text: Tier 2 capital includes eligible Tier 2 instruments and provisions, net of deductions. Report Tier 2 in the COREP own funds template line for Tier 2 capital.

title: COREP CA1 template instructions
text: Template CA1 captures own funds components. Lines 010, 020, 030 capture CET1, AT1, and Tier 2 respectively. Line 060 captures Total own funds. Report amounts in GBP thousands.
